paragraphs.text: This weapon was used by a Fire Navy officer's ship when its crew tried to destroy a Fire Nation ship that was captured by Team Avatar. Several ballistae were utilized during the invasion to hinder the advance of the waterbending-powered submarines toward the Royal Plaza. One managed to puncture one of the submarines before Katara sliced the chain of the projectile. It was later used at the Boiling Rock to pull in a cooler that Chit Sang, his girlfriend, and another inmate had attempted to escape in.
